title: Generative AI-Integrated Pedagogical Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in secondary science education and basic proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Providing experiential learning in AI-integrated lesson design and implementation through VR simulations that replicate real classroom settings

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain three or more educational applications of generative AI
Through asynchronous discussion participation, learners can identify two ethical issues arising in AI-integrated lesson design
Learners can develop one or more AI-utilized lesson modules specialized for science subjects in VR simulation environments

resources: Science Curriculum AI Integration Case Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
